description.author: Alan Zimmerman, Matthew Pickering
description.description:
Using the API Annotations available from GHC 9.2.1, this
library provides a means to round trip any code that can
be compiled by GHC, currently excluding lhs files.

Note: requires GHC 9.2 or later. For GHC versions from
7.10.2 to 9.0.* see this library with versions < 1.1

package-flags.name: dev
package-flags.description: Development mode, do not use ghc-exactprint lib in the tests
